title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21ยง 1.8 - Withdrawal of applications and petitions and surrender of licenses and registrations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21ยง 1.8 - Withdrawal of applications and petitions and surrender of licenses and registrations

State Regulations

Applications or petitions submitted to the commission may be
withdrawn only with the permission of the commission. Licenses or registrations
may be surrendered only with the permission of the commission. Such permission
may be granted unconditionally or with prejudice. The pendency of such
application or petition to withdraw or to surrender shall not prevent the
ordering of a hearing or the continuance of a hearing under section 1 or 3 of
article XI of the Act, as appropriate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21ยง
1.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
